descriptionHtml:
Hello! This is my first mod i ever made with the creation kit.
This mod adds a new Follower to the game called Lykia you may wounder what made me come upp with that name??
Well the answere is Lydia i got so bored one day when playing Skyrim with lydia... and wanted to give her someone new :D. So i made her a sister Called Lykia

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Uppdate!  
In v1 there whas a problem she attacked everyone and yea its fixed now Thx to agentgore99 for helping me fix her Random attack on the guards :D thx so mutch :)
in v2 iv added a new hair style not from me but you need it to be able to make he look like that :) 
This mod works with UFO Followers to! 
She have a new sword an Deadric Enchanted sword and a shield Dragon=
You can find her in the market in WhiteRun :) first she whas in the DragonReach :) 

Things that you need to get this working is:
Apachiii Hairstyle! 


Wanna thx to:
Behesta to make The Elder Scroll Serie! and  for the creation kit! 


Know problem:
In whiterun when you go to the small farm where the cow is (Inside the city) the ground have ben moved for some odd reason!
author: SweDishFrost
